name: Kwangryeol Park
intro: Hi, I'm Kwangryeol Park, a front-end developer currently working at an IT consulting company based in Tokyo, Japan. For the past 2 years, I've worked as both as an IT consultant, focusing on research and requirement designs, and a front-end developer, building on the concepts and designs that I've created. Passionate about coding and user-experience, I hope to continue my career as a front-end developer making new tools and applications for the advancement and improvement of society.
work experience: IT Consultant & Front-end Developer at BayCurrent Consulting / 2018-
education: Undergraduate: Studied BSc Actuarial Science at LSE / 2014-2017
Postgraduate: Studied MSc Risk Management at LSE / 2017-2018
etc: Taking CSS and JavaScript courses on Udemy
